directions: Sift together into a medium sized bowl the flour, baking powder and salt. Cut in shortening. Stir milk in with a fork until dough cleans sides of bowl. Toss on a lightly floured surface until no longer sticky. Pat or roll out to a 6-inch square. Cut into 36 i-inch squares. Fry in oil heated to 375 degrees. Fry 6 squares at a time, about 3 minutes to a side, turning only once. Drain on paper toweling in a warm oven. Serve with cream gravy. Makes 36 biscuits.
title: Fried Biscuits
